full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHAS MCHOG NGAG DBANG DPAL LDAN PA'I THUN MONG PA'I RNAM THAR LAS BRTZAMS PA'I GTAM DAD PA'I 'JUG NGOGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @033A *, ,CES PA 'DI NI DGE LDAN BSTAN PA'I RTZA LAG RJE BTZUN BLA MA MKHAS MCHOG NGAG DBANG DPAL LDAN PA'I ZHAL SNGA NAS KYI RNAM DKAR GYI MDZAD PA GONG NAS GONG DU 'PHEL BZHIN PA RGYA MTSO LTA BU ZHIG LAS, ,CHA SHAS TZAM BRJOD PAR BYED PA'I GTAM DAD PA'I 'JUG NGOGS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, CHOS MTHUN GYI GROGS 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA DANG RANG NYID KYANG DAD PAS MTSAMS SBYAR TE, RJE BTZUN BLA MA DAM PA 'DI NYID KYI GSUNG GI BDUD RTZIS NYE BAR 'TSO BA, SLOB BU KUN GYI THA SHAL BA 'JIGS MED RDO RJES GUS PA CHEN POS BRIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI ZHABS PAD BRTAN PA DANG, RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
